name: Milky Bubble Battle Boiz
description:
Milky Bubble Battle Boiz is a 3D Multiplayer Battle Arena Platformer where you suck up bubble tea themed platforms and shoot off your opponents!  

Featuring the cute flavorlings with their straw blowguns, duke it out in local multiplayer with your friends!  While jumping around in a giant bubble tea, make sure you're not the one swimming with the flavors!

At the end of the day only one question remains... Who will be the last boi standing?

If you want to leave some feedback please fill out our Feedback survey!

https://forms.gle/EWd9WYoaxXx3rArx6

For the Game Testing Guide, click the link below!

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1zUjPMgaVVFaAdoWPWH-UjcD9VxObnEOW-ZAJmnoJLiA/...
